title: TPG Rises in First Day of Trading After IPO
sub_head: Stock opened at $33, giving the private-equity firm a valuation of about $10 billion
body:
Shares of TPG Inc. rose in their stock-market debut Thursday, notching a valuation of roughly $10 billion for the private-equity firm and marking a positive sign for the IPO market.
The stock opened at $33, up 12% from its initial-public-offering price. It recently traded at $33.85, up 15%. On Wednesday, the firm and an existing investor raised $1 billion by selling stock in its IPO.
